abstract: Years before the current case erupted, authorities missed an opportunity to break up a nascent insider trading ring.
snippet: Years before the current case erupted, authorities missed an opportunity to break up a nascent insider trading ring.
lead_paragraph: The first tip from inside Intel reached Raj Rajaratnam more than a decade ago  from the same source who has now turned against him in the biggest insider-trading case in a generation.

headline.main: Hints of Missed Chance to Pursue Galleon Case
headline.print_headline: Hints of Missed Chance to Pursue Galleon Case

byline.original: By Ashlee Vance and Michael J. de la Merced
